panels.description: Includes level=ERROR and hidden errors in INFO logs

targets.expr: sum(count_over_time({app="fal.ai"} | json | level = `ERROR` [$__range])) + sum(count_over_time({app="fal.ai"} |~ `ERROR - ` != "Error in input" != "closing" | json | level != `ERROR` | line_format "{{.message}}" | regexp `ERROR - (?P<error_type>[^:]+)` | error_type != "" [$__range]))

panels.title: Total Errors

targets.expr: sum(count_over_time({app="fal.ai"} | json | message =~ `.*\[user_[^:]+:[^\]]+\].*` [$__range])) / sum(count_over_time({app="fal.ai"} | json | message =~ `.*\[user_[^:]+:[^\]]+\].*` [$__range])) * count(sum by (user) (count_over_time({app="fal.ai"} | json | message =~ `.*\[user_[^:]+:[^\]]+\].*` | regexp `\[(?P<user>user_[^:]+):[^\]]+\]` [$__range])))

panels.description: Tracks application startups - multiple startups in short periods may indicate crash loops
panels.title: Application Lifecycle (Crash Loop Indicator)

panels.description: Potential crash indicators: track error spikes, abnormal session terminations, and critical failures

targets.expr: sum(count_over_time({app="fal.ai"} | json | message =~ `.*Error in input loop.*` [$__interval]))

panels.title: Error Types (Crash Indicators)

panels.description: Logs that may indicate crashes or critical failures
panels.title: Potential Crash / Critical Error Logs

panels.description: User activity based on log messages containing user IDs in format [user_XXX:session]
panels.title: User Activity Over Time

panels.description: Recent user sessions with their activity
panels.title: User Session Logs

panels.description: Shows pipeline configurations users requested (from initial parameters)
panels.title: User Session Configurations (Pipelines & Settings)

targets.expr: sum(count_over_time({app="fal.ai"} | json | message =~ `.*PipelineProcessor started for pipeline: longlive.*` [$__range]))
sum(count_over_time({app="fal.ai"} | json | message =~ `.*PipelineProcessor started for pipeline: rife.*` [$__range]))
sum(count_over_time({app="fal.ai"} | json | message =~ `.*PipelineProcessor started for pipeline: optical-flow.*` [$__range]))
sum(count_over_time({app="fal.ai"} | json | message =~ `.*PipelineProcessor started for pipeline: video-depth-anything.*` [$__range]))
sum(count_over_time({app="fal.ai"} | json | message =~ `.*PipelineProcessor started for pipeline: memflow.*` [$__range]))
sum(count_over_time({app="fal.ai"} | json | message =~ `.*PipelineProcessor started for pipeline: scribble.*` [$__range]))
sum(count_over_time({app="fal.ai"} | json | message =~ `.*PipelineProcessor started for pipeline: passthrough.*` [$__range]))
sum(count_over_time({app="fal.ai"} | json | message =~ `.*PipelineProcessor started for pipeline: longlive.*` [$__interval]))
sum(count_over_time({app="fal.ai"} | json | message =~ `.*PipelineProcessor started for pipeline: rife.*` [$__interval]))
sum(count_over_time({app="fal.ai"} | json | message =~ `.*PipelineProcessor started for pipeline: optical-flow.*` [$__interval]))
sum(count_over_time({app="fal.ai"} | json | message =~ `.*PipelineProcessor started for pipeline: video-depth-anything.*` [$__interval]))
sum(count_over_time({app="fal.ai"} | json | message =~ `.*PipelineProcessor started for pipeline: memflow.*` [$__interval]))
sum(count_over_time({app="fal.ai"} | json | message =~ `.*PipelineProcessor started for pipeline: scribble.*` [$__interval]))

panels.description: Groups all errors including those logged at INFO level with 'ERROR -' prefix

targets.expr: sum by (error_type) (count_over_time({app="fal.ai"} |~ `ERROR - ` != "Error in input" != "closing" | json | line_format "{{.message}}" | regexp `ERROR - (?P<error_type>[^:]+)` | error_type != "" [$__range]))

panels.title: Error Type Distribution

panels.description: Stacked view of all error types over time, including hidden INFO-level errors

targets.expr: sum by (error_type) (count_over_time({app="fal.ai"} |~ `ERROR - ` != "Error in input" != "closing" | json | line_format "{{.message}}" | regexp `ERROR - (?P<error_type>[^:]+)` | error_type != "" [$__interval]))

panels.title: Error Types Over Time

panels.description: Count of all errors: level=ERROR + hidden errors in INFO logs

targets.expr: sum(count_over_time({app="fal.ai"} |~ `ERROR - ` != "Error in input" != "closing" | json | line_format "{{.message}}" | regexp `ERROR - (?P<error_type>[^:]+)` | error_type != "" [$__range])) + sum(count_over_time({app="fal.ai"} | json | level = `ERROR` | message !~ `ERROR - ` [$__range]))

panels.title: Total Errors (All Sources)

panels.description: Errors logged as level=INFO but containing 'ERROR -' in message

targets.expr: sum(count_over_time({app="fal.ai"} |~ `ERROR - ` != "Error in input" != "closing" | json | level = `INFO` | line_format "{{.message}}" | regexp `ERROR - (?P<error_type>[^:]+)` | error_type != "" [$__range]))

panels.title: Hidden Errors (INFO level)

panels.description: Shows level=ERROR, level=WARNING, and INFO-level logs containing 'ERROR -'
panels.title: All Error & Warning Logs (incl. hidden INFO-level errors)
